title: An invective ayenste the great and detestable vice, treason wherein the secrete practises, and traiterous workinges of theym, that suffrid of late are disclosed. made by Rycharde Morisyne.
author: Morison, Richard, Sir, d. 1556.
publisher: In ædibus Thomæ Bertheleti typis impress. Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum,
